name: Catnip Party
desc:
The Catnip makes the crew much more relaxed while repairing in the middle of combat, increasing their speed and allowing them to psycologicallly ignore the consequences of hyperspace radiation.
The proliferation of cat ears in humans under the effects of the the catnip is an unfortunate side-effect.
sModDesc: Reduces effect of being in a corona and further facilitates repairing.
